Package com.adobe.aem.modernize.component

Interface ComponentRewriteRuleService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    RewriteRuleService
    @ProviderType
public interface ComponentRewriteRuleService
extends RewriteRuleService
    Provides a mechanism for listing all configured rules either via Nodes or custom implementations.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.adobe.aem.modernize.rule.RewriteRuleService

        find, listRules

    • Method Detail

      • apply

        void apply​(@NotNull
           @NotNull org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource resource,
           @NotNull
           @NotNull Set<String> rules,
           boolean deep)
    throws RewriteException
        Applies the indicated rules to the provided resource. If deep is set, rules will be applied recursively.

        Transformations are performed but not saved.

        The rules can be either a fully qualified path to a rule or a Service PID depending on the implementation.

        Implementations decide how to handle rule paths which are invalid for their context.

        Parameters:
        resource - Parent node for applying rules
        rules - the rules to apply
        deep - true to recurse into the tree
        Throws:
        RewriteException - if any errors occur when applying the rules
